metadata.title: CVE-2017-16908 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Horde Groupware 5.2.19, there is XSS via the Name field during creationof a new Resource. This can be leveraged for remote code execution aftercompromising an administrator account, because the CVE-2015-7984 CSRFprotection mechanism can then be bypassed.

criterions.comment: php-horde-kronolith package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
